item.title: Celebrate the holiday season at the Westin Singapore in 2017!
item.description: Source: The Westin Singapore website. The apple glazed turkey at Seasonal Tastes. Celebrate this holiday season at the Westin Singapore with their Christmas offerings. Enjoy delicious yule log cakes, savory roasts, thoughtful Christmas hampers, and gourmet selections at Seasonal Tastes and Cook & Brew. Christmas Eve and Christmas Day The Christmas Eve lunch buffet at Seasonal Tastes includes tempting dishes like lobster bisque, grilled Aussie tomahawk, maple and miso glazed salmon, and panettone bread pudding with vanilla Anglaise (a delicate pouring custard).
